overview: Bum-soo Kim is a marketing and strategy professional based in Los Angeles, CA. He started his career as a product manager of telecommunication services in South Korea. Since he got his MBA from UCLA Anderson School of Management, he has worked in marketing, strategy consulting and web development in both the US and South Korea. He is currently working as a senior manager of online marketing and web development of KBS America, a Korean government owned TV content distributor in the US.
